CatDescriptText: The list of names at the bottom of the  image of women in gowns on the back wall reads, "Jerry Fedele, Hair Stylist, Member of the Los Angeles Coiffure Guild, Pittsburgh's Own Melody Guild, A Pittsburgh Junior Achievement Co., Top Row - Left to Right: Loretie Luppe, Lois Aubble, Lois Kriss, Peggy Slevin, Jerry Fedele, Genevieve Lasick, Cathryn Lazar, Dorothy Mooney, Joy Messner, Nancy Amigh,   Bottom Row - Left - Right:  Phyllis Carrington, Marion Helm, Ruth Slaney, Mildred Don, Joan Trueman, Myralin Mcclintock, Carolyn Holub, Barabara Owens, Mary Alice Nicholas.
TitMainTitle: Girls hand sewing and knitting, with large photograph of Melody Guild on back wall and Business ABC posted on bottom of window frame
